sense.gloss: to lose strength, to become weak, to disappear (of energy, drive, etc.)
to wither, to droop, to wilt
to feel demotivated, to lose interest, to become disappointed
to shrivel (e.g. cut vegetables, skin), to wilt, to fade, to wither, to be wizened
to wither, to wilt, to droop, to fade
to be dejected, to be disheartened, to be depressed, to be crestfallen
to wither (of flowers, dreams, etc.), to wilt, to droop, to shrivel, to fade (away), to sag, to deflate

sdata.j: ↑暑↑↓あつ↓さのために↑花↑↓はな↓は↑萎↑↓しお↓れた。
sdata.e: The hot sun made the flowers hang down.

sdata.j: ↑美↑↓うつく↓しいバラもいつかは↑萎↑↓しお↓れる。
sdata.e: The fairest rose is at last withered.

sdata.j: ↑最近↑↓さいきん↓↑気分↑↓きぶん↓が↑萎↑↓な↓え↑気味↑↓ぎみ↓だ。
sdata.e: Recently I've been feeling a bit down.

words.gloss: to lose strength, to become weak, to disappear (of energy, drive, etc.)
